page.title: 08MAIDENHALL FARM ESTATE 1
page.content: The estate is located 3 miles from Gloucester.The A40 trunk road,south of Highnam,runs from Gloucester to Ross-on-Wye and a duel carriage way puts Maidenhall Farm within minutes of the city.A regular 'bus service connects the estate with Gloucester and Newent.The estate is well placed as regards the national road network, having good access to the M5 motorway, and London via the M4 and M40. The estate layout is designed to blend into its rural setting.The houses,all detached,are spaced out along short,curved branch roads,many ending in cul-de-sacs.Each house has been assigned an average sized plot of land and access by car is via each cul-de-sac.No homes front onto the main estate road,and few front direct- ly onto the main service road.
